title: 'Good product for office use and entertainment.'
body: Pro: 1. Image and video quality is very good( in i5 3570 processor,HDMI). 2. Pixels are ok. 3. Good for office use. 4. Good looking and good build quality. 5. Good text view.  Cons: 1. Brightness is very high. At 0 brightness with 0 contrast the screen seems normal. 2. No sound system. 3. Eye comfort did not work for me.  Conclusion: Good image quality product. Use it for seeing movies, pictures, normal office tasks. If you want best picture quality then use a good graphic card and a good processor (i5,i7). In this price range don't expect sAMOLED display.

title: Ideal monitor for the price. However the tilt functionality was hard to figure out but it's there.
body: The media could not be loaded. I bought the 2020 model, and for 2 years I believed the monitor was incapable of tilting. But if you remove the black tape shown in the image I've attached, there will be two screws. Slightly unscrew both of them to unlock the tilt functionality, as shown in the video I've attached.  All other aspects of this monitor are too good for the price. Worth every penny, no regrets. Samsung delivers.

title: 'Disappointing with Plastic Body Build Quality'
body: While the display is impressive, I'm disappointed with the plastic body build quality. It feels cheap and resembles a hastily printed 3rd-tier product. A letdown, considering the potential of the display.

title: 'Not happy with the seller'
body: The screen works fine. But I think there's an issue with the seller. There were no instructions on how to set up the stand and I think it was broken as well.  Because I cannot change the orientation of the screen. It's fixed in one place after screwing in the stand but I can that it has been tampered with.
